      • isLeftButtonAndAltDown

        public static boolean isLeftButtonAndAltDown(MouseEvent event)
        Check to see if the event is for the left mouse button and the Alt key is pressed. Also allows the right mouse button with the control key down. This is so it can work via Citrix Receiver.
        Parameters:
        event -
        Returns:
